description: This header file defines utility functions within the Utils namespace for persisting files and JSON settings, including functions to synchronize file contents to disk and to persist JSON configuration data, likely used in infrastructure components.

methods.name: void syncPersistFile(const string file)
methods.description: Synchronizes a file to disk by opening it, flushing buffers, and calling fsync.

methods.name: void persistJsonSettings(const string strFile,const string strKey,const JsonValue & jsValue)
methods.description: Persists JSON configuration data to a file and ensures it is synchronized to disk.

ctags.name: persistJsonSettings
ctags.pattern: /^inline void persistJsonSettings(const string strFile, const string strKey, const JsonValue& jsVa/
ctags.signature: (const string strFile,const string strKey,const JsonValue & jsValue)
